import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Register() { useEffect(() => { document.title='Teacher Register' }) const [teacherData, setTeacherData] = useState({ 'full_name': '', 'email': '', 'password': '', 'qualification': '', 'mobile_no': '', 'skills': '', 'status': '' }) function handleChange(event){ setTeacherData({ ...teacherData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } function handleSubmit(event){ const teacherFormData = new FormData(); teacherData.append("full_name", teacherData.full_name) teacherData.append("email", teacherData.full_name) teacherData.append("password", teacherData.full_name) teacherData.append("qualification", teacherData.full_name) teacherData.append("mobile_no", teacherData.full_name) teacherData.append("skills", teacherData.full_name) } return (
Teacher Register
Math, economics, chemistry, etc.
) } export default Register;
